main.name: Lorenah M
main.description: Results-oriented with more than 6 years of experience in sales and marketing. Well-versed in promoting object-oriented approaches to real-time software development and product marketing. Analytical and detail-oriented with deep knowledge in latest industry trends and advancements
main.bio: I build unique custom apps & websites that convert visitors into customers who help businesses and people grow.When I'm not coding, I'm probably singing at my shows, advocating for overrall health, writing poetry, watching basketball, in the gym or goofing around on something inspired by Pablo Picasso.
main.contactmessage: I'm always working on something, and often too excited about it to stop and update my portfolio. Feel free to reach out and see what I'm up to now. I also have major skills in sales, product marketing, vocal, and art design. If you have a project or creative need that I can help with, I am that guy! My specialty is full Android strategy, design and development. My interests, however, extend beyond the web and I love giving back to the community, helping people with brand promotion, art design and marketing.

resume.skillmessage: Java, Ruby, Angular, React, Android, jQuery, JavaScript, Sinatra

testimonials.text: Great developer, has client's needs at heart and puts them first
I thoroughly enjoyed my time working with her, and came to know Lorenah as a truly valuable asset to our team.
